chunk:
Admire My Skin 15% Bakuchiol Serum

Brand: Admire My Skin

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: AQUA (DEIONIZED WATER), ALOE BARBARDENSIS ORGANIC ALOE VERA) LEAF JUICE, PSORALEA CORYLIFOLIA (BAKUCHIOL) EXTRACT, HAMAMELIS VIRGINIANA (WITCH HAZEL), DIMETHYL SULFONE (MSM), SEA WATER EXTRACT, ACRYLATES/C10-30 ALKYL ACRYLATE CROSSPOLYMER, SIMMONDSIA CHINENSIS SEED OIL (ORGANIC JOJOBA) SEED OIL, CURCUMA LONGA RHIZOME EXTRACT (ORGANIC

(WITCH HAZEL), DIMETHYL SULFONE (MSM), SEA WATER EXTRACT, ACRYLATES/C10-30 ALKYL ACRYLATE CROSSPOLYMER, SIMMONDSIA CHINENSIS SEED OIL (ORGANIC JOJOBA) SEED OIL, CURCUMA LONGA RHIZOME EXTRACT (ORGANIC TURMERIC), CHONDRUS CRISPUS (IRISH MOSS) EXTRACT, SPIRULINA MAXIMA (SPIRULINA) EXTRACT, POTASSIUM SORBATE, SODIUM BENZOATE, ACHILLEA MILLEFOLIUM

SEED OIL, CURCUMA LONGA RHIZOME EXTRACT (ORGANIC TURMERIC), CHONDRUS CRISPUS (IRISH MOSS) EXTRACT, SPIRULINA MAXIMA (SPIRULINA) EXTRACT, POTASSIUM SORBATE, SODIUM BENZOATE, ACHILLEA MILLEFOLIUM (YARROW) EXTRACT, EQUISETUM ARVENSE (ORGANIC HORSETAIL PLANT) EXTRACT, GERANIUM MACULATUM (WILD GERANIUM) EXTRACT, CENTELLA ASIATICA (ORGANIC GOTU KOLA)

SORBATE, SODIUM BENZOATE, ACHILLEA MILLEFOLIUM (YARROW) EXTRACT, EQUISETUM ARVENSE (ORGANIC HORSETAIL PLANT) EXTRACT, GERANIUM MACULATUM (WILD GERANIUM) EXTRACT, CENTELLA ASIATICA (ORGANIC GOTU KOLA) EXTRACT, TARAXACUM OFFICINALE (ORGANIC DANDELION) EXTRACT, PHENOXYETH ANOL, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN.
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
